editions.flavor: The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.
The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.
Within the thorned labyrinth, a hearth’s embers give rise to roses that bloom with forgotten visages.
Within the thorned labyrinth, a hearth’s embers give rise to roses that bloom with forgotten visages.
The vermillion bird blazes a fiery trail across the horizon, alight with a passion for knowledge.
The vermillion bird blazes a fiery trail across the horizon, alight a passion for knowledge.

effect: **On Enter:** Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Smoldering flames burn bright from within the soul, sparking a hunger for insight and destruction.
name: Spirit of Fire

result_editions.flavor: Within the thorned labyrinth, a hearth’s embers give rise to roses that bloom with forgotten visages.

effect_html: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

editions.flavor: The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The rivers of Wool Brook flow with depths concealed beneath reflections too perfect to trust.
The rivers of Wool Brook flow with depths concealed beneath reflections too perfect to trust.
The tides and waves thrash again as serpent and tortoise entwined awaken from their slumber.
The tides and waves thrash again as serpent and tortoise entwined awaken from their slumber.

effect: **On Enter:** Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Convalescing waves cascade through the soul, revitalizing the body and mind from the depths.
name: Spirit of Water

result_editions.flavor: The rivers of Wool Brook flow with depths concealed beneath reflections too perfect to trust.

effect_html: On Enter: Draw seven cards.

effect:
**On Enter**: You gain the Servile Possessions mastery.

**Inherited Effect** — At the beginning of your end phase, you may banish a card from your graveyard or hand and put an **omen** counter on it.
effect_raw:
On Enter: You gain the Servile Possessions mastery.

Inherited Effect — At the beginning of your end phase, you may banish a card from your graveyard or hand and put an omen counter on it.
flavor: "Miss Alice, I am at your service."

rule.description: Cards in banishment with omen counters on them are omens.

effect_html: On Enter: You gain the Servile Possessions mastery.Inherited Effect — At the beginning of your end phase, you may banish a card from your graveyard or hand and put an omen counter on it.

effect:
**Ciel Lineage**

**On Enter**: For each omen you have, discard a card from your hand or memory and draw a card into your memory.

**Lineage Release** — You may activate one of your omens. Activate this ability only if you have six or more omens.
effect_raw:
Ciel Lineage

On Enter: For each omen you have, discard a card from your hand or memory and draw a card into your memory.

Lineage Release — You may activate one of your omens. Activate this ability only if you have six or more omens.
name: Ciel, Omenbringer

rule.description: Cards in banishment with omen counters on them are omens.
Each discard and draw into memory are separate actions, you can discard a card you drew into memory with this effect.

effect:
**Diana Lineage**

Whenever Diana becomes **distant**, choose one—
• **Negate** each card activation that targets Diana unless its controller pays (2). Then if Diana is defending, end the combat phase unless the attacking player pays (2).
• **Glimpse 2**.
effect_raw:
Diana Lineage

Whenever Diana becomes distant, choose one—
• Negate each card activation that targets Diana unless its controller pays (2). Then if Diana is defending, end the combat phase unless the attacking player pays (2).
• Glimpse 2.
name: Diana, Moonpiercer
effect_html: Diana LineageWhenever Diana becomes distant, choose one— • Negate each card activation that targets Diana unless its controller pays 2. Then if Diana is defending, end the combat phase unless the attacking player pays 2. • Glimpse 2.

editions.flavor:
How doth the little crocodile improve his shining tail,
And pour the waters of the Nile on every golden scale!
The imperial treasury lies unclaimed. Both avaricious and ambitious covet the wealth hidden within.

editions.flavor: In a lovely garden, nestled among beds of bright flowers, lies a peculiar amulet—though reaching it may not be so simple.

"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk."
– Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage
"An occultist's desperate pursuit for immortality. However, what came back was but only a husk." — Si Ma Hui, Hermit Sage

"An alchemist's impossible wish to bring his dearly departed beloved back from the other side."
— Astarte, Celestial Dawn
In a lovely garden, nestled among beds of bright flowers, lies a peculiar amulet—though reaching it may not be so simple.

effect: Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish CARDNAME. If you do, draw a card.

— Gildas, Chronicler of Aesa

effect:
[Ciel Bonus] Whenever your champion attacks, depending on the amount of omens you have— 
• 1 to 2— That attack gets +1[POWER].
• 3 to 4— That attack gets +2[POWER].
• 5 or more— That attack gets +3[POWER]. Draw a card into your memory.

rule.description: If you starcall a card, that card is put onto the stack during the glimpse effect. It does not start resolving until after the current effect finishes resolving. For example, Scry the Skies has you glimpse 4, you starcall a card, you finish resolving Scry the Skies by drawing a card into your memory, then the effects stack can start resolving more cards.
